name: Smock ball
description: Fint mønster, hvis du liker å utfordre deg selv litt. Mønsteret benytter rett, vrang, kast, omvendt kast, 2 rett sammen, 2 og 3 vrang sammen i skjønn forening og tidvis samtidig med smock.
full_text: Nice pattern, if you like to challenge yourself a bit. The pattern uses knit, purl, yarn over, reverse yarn over, knit 2 together, purl 2 and 3 together in a nice combination and sometimes at the same time with smock. The knitting strength is not important. Nice pattern if you'd like to challenge yourself a bit. The pattern uses knit, purl, yo, M1T, k2tog, p2tog, p3tog in a lovely blend and sometimes in a smock. Gauge is not important.
